findings.title: Prevent contract to be initialized multiple times
findings.description: The PositionManager can be re-initialized numerous times, allowing ownership to be claimed.

findings.title: SwapToPositionRatio function can be called by anyone
findings.description: The swapToPositionRatio() function has no authorization checks, allowing it to be called by anyone.

findings.title: LendingPoolAddress can be set by anyone
findings.description: The setLendingPoolAddress() function has no authorization checks, allowing it to be called by anyone.

findings.title: Logic to find best pool does not find best one
findings.description: The function returns the pool with the most liquidity at the given slot instead of finding the best pool.

findings.title: Missing liquidity in Aave deposit
findings.description: The amountToAave calculation only accounts for the collected fees, not for the liquidity received by closing the position.

findings.title: Relying on external security promises for ticks
findings.description: The result of the call to the NonfungiblePositionManager returns the lower and upper ticks, which are not checked and can lead to the calculation in line 111 to over- or underflow.

findings.title: Unsafe cast to int24
findings.description: The cast of a uint24 to int24 is dangerous and should be properly executed and verified.

findings.title: Severe over-/underflow risk without SafeMath
findings.description: As SafeMath is not used, there are several risks of under- and/or overflows due to the nature of the calculation.

findings.title: Empty data doesnâ€™t always revert
findings.description: With the modules and actions generally reverting in case of the data being non-existent, this is mostly fine.

findings.title: Wrong comparison operator
findings.description: During the check on whether the balance is greater than the required amount, a less_than (<) is used instead of making use of a less_than_equal (<=).

findings.title: Misleading or wrong documentation
findings.description: Certain parts of the documentation are misleading or wrong.

findings.title: Not making use of SafeMath where appropriate
findings.description: In certain locations, calculations are facilitated without SafeMath in a Solidity version that is lower than 0.8.

findings.title: Unsecured approval and wrong maximum value
findings.description: Using the wrong address for approval, using the wrong amount, and not following best practice for uint256 maximum value.

findings.title: NC.6 - Use underscores for large numerals
findings.description: Not using underscores for large numerals, reducing readability.

findings.title: NC.7 - Not using the getStorage function
findings.description: Retrieving storage manually instead of using the provided getStorage() function.

findings.title: NC.8 - Unnecessary double function exposed
findings.description: Exposing an unnecessary function that increases contract size without any benefit.

findings.title: NC.9 - Insufficient state-modifying function
findings.description: Not validating input and possibly emitting events without state change.

findings.title: NC.10 - Unnecessary deadline extension
findings.description: Extending deadlines unnecessarily when executed by a contract.
findings.location: actions/ClosePosition.sol - Line 46 and other multiple locations

findings.title: NC.11 - Wrong type used for Uniswap V3
findings.description: Implicit conversion due to using uint256 instead of uint128

findings.title: NC.12 - Not using the default method for maximum values
findings.description: Manual calculation instead of using type(uint128).max

findings.title: NC.13 - Making use of undocumented side effects
findings.description: Certain function is making use of undocumented side effects.

findings.title: NC.16 - Use of transferFrom instead of safeTransferFrom
findings.description: The code of the distance check is a near duplicate of the code in the _getTokens() function of the UniswapNFTHelper contract.

findings.title: NC.17 - Unchangeable global variables should be immutable
findings.description: Certain occurrences of global variables that should never change, hence should be immutable to ensure that this is the case.

findings.title: NC.18 - Missing visibility keyword
findings.description: Certain occurrences of global variables are missing a visibility keyword, leading to them being private, which is often not the desired behaviour.

findings.title: NC.19 - Function can be exported to library
findings.description: The code of the distance check is a near duplicate of the code in the _getTokens() function of the UniswapNFTHelper contract.

findings.title: NC.6 - Use transferFrom instead of safeTransferFrom
findings.description: The code in ERC20Helper.sol uses transferFrom, which is not recommended because it allows the receiver to re-enter the sender.

findings.title: Gas Optimization - Cache array length
findings.description: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

findings.title: Gas Optimization - Optimize loops
findings.description: Optimizing for-loops to be more efficient in terms of gas usage.

findings.title: Gas Optimization - Donâ€™t initialize variables with default value
findings.description: Initializing variables with their default values uses more gas than necessary.

findings.title: Gas Optimization - Use !=0 instead of >0 for uint comparisons
findings.description: Checking for != 0 instead of > 0 in require statements saves gas.

findings.title: Gas Optimization - Cache certain variables to save gas
findings.description: Caching variables that are read often saves gas.
findings.location: PositionManager.sol (Line 237), actions/AaveDeposit.sol (Line 33), actions/DecreaseLiquidity.sol (Line 44), actions/IncreaseLiquidity.sol (Line 37), actions/Mint.sol (Line 37), actions/ZapIn.sol (Line 123), actions/ZapOut.sol (Line 86), modules/AaveModule.sol (Lines 71, 95), modules/AutoCompoundModule.sol (Line 59), modules/IdleLiquidityModule.sol (Line 126), utils/DepositRecipes.sol (Lines 41-47)

findings.title: Unnecessary Storage Slot Usage
findings.description: The pool variable is being obtained in two steps, with the outcome of the first step never being used again.

findings.title: Unnecessary Multiple Approvals
findings.description: The approveToken() function is called twice with the same inputs, wasting gas.

findings.title: Possible Caching Opportunity
findings.description: The result of the call to the NonfungiblePositionManager could be cached to prevent a double calling.

findings.title: Inefficient Array Access
findings.description: The access to the whitelistedKeepers array gets more expensive as the array size increases, with the cost of the access being O(n).
